subtitle: good morning today is the Eighth Day of
the counting of the Omer making one week
and one day of the Omer
the emotional attribute for today is
Hassan gavora which is loving kindness
and discipline
Rabbi Jacobson tells us in his spiritual
guide to counting the Omer
that the underlying intention and motive
of discipline is love
and he poses the question why do we
measure our Behavior why do we establish
standards and expect people to live up
to them and the answer is only because
of Love on this day we must evaluate the
purpose and hope of our Discipline Do we
want the best for the people whom we
discipline
or do we judge them too harshly the
exercise for the day before we criticize
someone today think twice is it out of
concern and love
